thread.title: Batched.com Launches Program To Provide EMV Equipment At No Cost To Small Business Owners
thread.title_full: Batched.com Launches Program To Provide EMV Equipment At No Cost To Small Business Owners

author: Media Relations
title: Batched.com Launches Program To Provide EMV Equipment At No Cost To Small Business Owners
text:
Batched Inc brings transparency to the credit card processing industry by shopping rates and services with multiple providers and providing small businesses a merchant service coach to decipher statements and provide education. Batched.com merchant service coaches work with and on behalf of small business owners to ensure the small business owner is matched with the correct processor for their specific business type. Batched.com merchant service coaches provide education and training to business owners so they understand the new requirements and the liability shift that is taking place on October 1, 2015. Batched.com merchant service coaches have been educating hundreds of businesses about the pitfalls of not upgrading their POS machines before the deadline. Business owners, have been grateful for the service and free equipment as their banks are not providing the educational resources because the banks are not liable for fraudulent charges if the merchant does not upgrade, the business owner is.
“It is amazing how many business owners are unaware of the new technology requirements and the liability shift that happens on October 1st” stated Matthew Loughran, Senior Vice President for Batched Inc. “This lack of education from banks and processors can have catastrophic results considering the business owner becomes 100% liable for fraudulent charges and customer data breaches on October 1st if they do not upgrade their equipment” added Loughran.
To learn more about the new requirements or speak with a merchant service coach from Batched.com please visit http://www.Batched.com or call 877-477-7115.
About Batched
Batched.com was founded to assist small business owners in finding the right merchant service plan for their specific business vertical at the most competitive price on the market. Batched remains diligent in their goal to deconstruct and make transparent the process of acquiring merchant services for small business owners around the globe. To obtain more information please contact Batched at 877-477-7115 or http://www.Batched.com
